italic_H end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG end_ARG .

Therefore, we define Œ∫=k‚àûùúÖsubscriptùëò\kappa=k_{\infty}italic_Œ∫ = italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àû end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and replace ktsubscriptùëòùë°k_{t}italic_k start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT with Œ∫ùúÖ\kappaitalic_Œ∫, and the update becomes:

ùê†~t|t‚àí1subscript~ùê†conditionalùë°ùë°1\displaystyle\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t|t-1}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t | italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =ùê†~t‚àí1+1B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t+Œ≥‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)‚àí‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ)Œ≥absentsubscript~ùê†ùë°11ùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùõæsubscriptùêùùë°1ùúâ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâùõæ\displaystyle=\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}% \frac{\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_% {t};\xi)}{\gamma}= over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG (Prediction)
ùê†~tsubscript~ùê†ùë°\displaystyle\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =ùê†~t|t‚àí1+Œ∫‚Å¢(ùê†t‚àíùê†~t|t‚àí1)absentsubscript~ùê†conditionalùë°ùë°1ùúÖsubscriptùê†ùë°subscript~ùê†conditionalùë°ùë°1\displaystyle=\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t|t-1}+\kappa(\mathbf{g}_{t}-\tilde{\mathbf{% g}}_{t|t-1})= over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t | italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∫ ( bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t | italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) (Correction)

Rearrange the terms, we have:

ùê†~tsubscript~ùê†ùë°\displaystyle\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢ùê†~t+Œ∫‚Å¢ùê†t+(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢1B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t+Œ≥‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)‚àí‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ)Œ≥absent1ùúÖsubscript~ùê†ùë°ùúÖsubscriptùê†ùë°1ùúÖ1ùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùõæsubscriptùêùùë°1ùúâ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâùõæ\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}+\kappa\mathbf{g}_{t}+(1-\kappa)% \frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\frac{\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma% \mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)}{\gamma}= ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∫ bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG
=(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢ùê†~t+Œ∫‚Å¢ùê†^t, withabsent1ùúÖsubscript~ùê†ùë°ùúÖsubscript^ùê†ùë° with\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}+\kappa\hat{\mathbf{g}}_{t},% \text{ with}= ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∫ over^ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , with
ùê†^tsubscript^ùê†ùë°\displaystyle\hat{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over^ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =ùê†t+1‚àíŒ∫Œ∫‚Å¢1B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t+Œ≥‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)‚àí‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ)Œ≥absentsubscriptùê†ùë°1ùúÖùúÖ1ùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùõæsubscriptùêùùë°1ùúâ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâùõæ\displaystyle=\mathbf{g}_{t}+\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa}\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in% \mathcal{B}_{t}}\frac{\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-% \nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)}{\gamma}= bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ end_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG
=1B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t(1‚àíŒ∫Œ∫‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t+Œ≥‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)+(1‚àí1‚àíŒ∫Œ∫‚Å¢Œ≥)‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ))+ùê∞t,absent1ùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°1ùúÖùúÖùõæ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùõæsubscriptùêùùë°1ùúâ11ùúÖùúÖùõæ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâsubscriptùê∞ùë°\displaystyle=\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\frac{1-\kappa}{% \kappa\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)+\left(1-\frac% {1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}\right)\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)\right)+\mathbf{w}_% {t},= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) + ( 1 - divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ) ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) ) + bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

where we substitute ùê†t=1B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨tclip‚Å¢(‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ),C)+ùê∞t.subscriptùê†ùë°1ùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°clip‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâùê∂subscriptùê∞ùë°\mathbf{g}_{t}=\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\mathrm{clip}\left(% \nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi),C\right)+\mathbf{w}_{t}.bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_clip ( ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) , italic_C ) + bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT . Then, by privatizing ùê†^tsubscript^ùê†ùë°\hat{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over^ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and rename it as ùê†tsubscriptùê†ùë°\mathbf{g}_{t}bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we have:

ùê†tsubscriptùê†ùë°\displaystyle\mathbf{g}_{t}bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =1B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨tclip‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫Œ∫‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t+Œ≥‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)+(1‚àí1‚àíŒ∫Œ∫‚Å¢Œ≥)‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ),C)+ùê∞tabsent1ùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°clip1ùúÖùúÖùõæ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùõæsubscriptùêùùë°1ùúâ11ùúÖùúÖùõæ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâùê∂subscriptùê∞ùë°\displaystyle=\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\mathrm{clip}\left(\frac{% 1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)+% \left(1-\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}\right)\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi),C% \right)+\mathbf{w}_{t}= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_clip ( divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) + ( 1 - divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ) ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) , italic_C ) + bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
ùê†~tsubscript~ùê†ùë°\displaystyle\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢ùê†~t+Œ∫‚Å¢ùê†t,absent1ùúÖsubscript~ùê†ùë°ùúÖsubscriptùê†ùë°\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}+\kappa\mathbf{g}_{t},= ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∫ bold_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

which is the update of Algorithm 3 (Lines 5 and 6).

A.4 Connection between DiSK and NAG and STORM

Algorithm 3 has an implicit connection to the (unified) Nesterov Accelerated Gradient (NAG) method (Shen et al., 2023; Sutskever et al., 2013) \xweditand the Stochastic Recursive Momentum (STORM) algorithm (Cutkosky & Orabona, 2019). The update of (half-shifted) NAG can be written as (Sutskever et al., 2013):

ùê¶tsubscriptùê¶ùë°\displaystyle\mathbf{m}_{t}bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =Œº‚Å¢ùê¶t‚àí1+Œ∑‚Å¢‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àíŒº‚Å¢ùê¶t‚àí1)absentùúásubscriptùê¶ùë°1ùúÇ‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúásubscriptùê¶ùë°1\displaystyle=\mu\mathbf{m}_{t-1}+\eta\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t}-\mu\mathbf{m}_{t% -1})= italic_Œº bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œº bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) (16)
ùê±t+1subscriptùê±ùë°1\displaystyle\mathbf{x}_{t+1}bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =ùê±t‚àíùê¶t,absentsubscriptùê±ùë°subscriptùê¶ùë°\displaystyle=\mathbf{x}_{t}-\mathbf{m}_{t},= bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,
\xwedit

and the update of STORM writes (Cutkosky & Orabona, 2019):

ùê¶tsubscriptùê¶ùë°\displaystyle\mathbf{m}_{t}bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =(1‚àíŒ±)‚Å¢ùê¶t‚àí1+Œ±‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t,Œæt)+(1‚àíŒ±)‚Å¢(‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t,Œæt)‚àí‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1,Œæt))absent1ùõºsubscriptùê¶ùë°1ùõº‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°subscriptùúâùë°1ùõº‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°subscriptùúâùë°‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°1subscriptùúâùë°\displaystyle=(1-\alpha)\mathbf{m}_{t-1}+\alpha\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t},\xi_{t}% )+(1-\alpha)(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t},\xi_{t})-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1},\xi_{t% }))= ( 1 - italic_Œ± ) bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ± ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + ( 1 - italic_Œ± ) ( ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) (17)
ùê±t+1subscriptùê±ùë°1\displaystyle\mathbf{x}_{t+1}bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =ùê±t‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢ùê¶t,absentsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúÇsubscriptùê¶ùë°\displaystyle=\mathbf{x}_{t}-\eta\mathbf{m}_{t},= bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ∑ bold_m start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

In comparison, in Algorithm 3, \xweditby letting the update of OptimizerUpdate be SGD, and assuming clipping is inactive, ùê∞t=0subscriptùê∞ùë°0\mathbf{w}_{t}=0bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = 0, i.e., without DP, œµ‚Üí‚àû‚Üíitalic-œµ\epsilon\rightarrow\inftyitalic_œµ ‚Üí ‚àû, the DiSK becomes:

ùê†~tsubscript~ùê†ùë°\displaystyle\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢ùê†~t‚àí1+Œ∫B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t(1‚àíŒ∫Œ∫‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t+Œ≥‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)+(1‚àí1‚àíŒ∫Œ∫‚Å¢Œ≥)‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ))absent1ùúÖsubscript~ùê†ùë°1ùúÖùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°1ùúÖùúÖùõæ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùõæsubscriptùêùùë°1ùúâ11ùúÖùúÖùõæ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâ\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\frac{\kappa}{B}\sum_{\xi\in% \mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+% \gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)+\big{(}1-\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}\big{)}% \nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)\right)= ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) + ( 1 - divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ) ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) ) (18)
=(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢ùê†~t‚àí1+Œ∫B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ)+1‚àíŒ∫B‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t(‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t+Œ≥‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)‚àí‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ))absent1ùúÖsubscript~ùê†ùë°1ùúÖùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâ1ùúÖùêµùõæsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùõæsubscriptùêùùë°1ùúâ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâ\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\frac{\kappa}{B}\sum_{\xi\in% \mathcal{B}_{t}}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)+\frac{1-\kappa}{B\gamma}\sum_{\xi% \in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-% \nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)\right)= ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) + divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_B italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) )
ùê±t+1subscriptùê±ùë°1\displaystyle\mathbf{x}_{t+1}bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =ùê±t‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢ùê†~t.absentsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúÇsubscript~ùê†ùë°\displaystyle=\mathbf{x}_{t}-\eta\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}.= bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ∑ over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Comparing the above updates, we observe that (16) and (17) are two special cases of (18) with specific choices of the parameters. Specifically, by letting Œ≥=1‚àíŒ∫Œ∫>0,Œ∑=Œ∫,1‚àíŒ∫=Œºformulae-sequenceùõæ1ùúÖùúÖ0formulae-sequenceùúÇùúÖ1ùúÖùúá\gamma=\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa}>0,\eta=\kappa,1-\kappa=\muitalic_Œ≥ = divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ end_ARG > 0 , italic_Œ∑ = italic_Œ∫ , 1 - italic_Œ∫ = italic_Œº, B=NùêµùëÅB=Nitalic_B = italic_N, we have 1‚àí1‚àíŒ∫Œ∫‚Å¢Œ≥=011ùúÖùúÖùõæ01-\frac{1-\kappa}{\kappa\gamma}=01 - divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ italic_Œ≥ end_ARG = 0, and the update of ùê†~tsubscript~ùê†ùë°\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT becomes ùê†~t=Œº‚Å¢ùê†~t‚àí1+Œ∑‚Å¢‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àíŒºŒ∑‚Å¢ùê†~t‚àí1)subscript~ùê†ùë°ùúásubscript~ùê†ùë°1ùúÇ‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúáùúÇsubscript~ùê†ùë°1\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}=\mu\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\eta\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t}% -\frac{\mu}{\eta}\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1})over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_Œº over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∑ end_ARG over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ), and DiSK becomes NAG; on the other hand, by letting Œ≥=‚àí1,Œ∫=Œ±formulae-sequenceùõæ1ùúÖùõº\gamma=-1,\kappa=\alphaitalic_Œ≥ = - 1 , italic_Œ∫ = italic_Œ±, B=1ùêµ1B=1italic_B = 1, we have ùê±t+Œ≥‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1=ùê±t‚àí(ùê±t‚àíùê±t‚àí1)=ùê±t‚àí1subscriptùê±ùë°ùõæsubscriptùêùùë°1subscriptùê±ùë°subscriptùê±ùë°subscriptùê±ùë°1subscriptùê±ùë°1\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1}=\mathbf{x}_{t}-(\mathbf{x}_{t}-\mathbf{x% }_{t-1})=\mathbf{x}_{t-1}bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, and the update of ùê†~tsubscript~ùê†ùë°\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT becomes ùê†~t=(1‚àíŒ±)‚Å¢ùê†~t‚àí1+Œ±‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæt)+(1‚àíŒ±)‚Å¢(‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ)‚àí‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1;Œæ))subscript~ùê†ùë°1ùõºsubscript~ùê†ùë°1ùõº‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°subscriptùúâùë°1ùõº‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°1ùúâ\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}=(1-\alpha)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\alpha\nabla f(% \mathbf{x}_{t};\xi_{t})+(1-\alpha)\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)-\nabla f(% \mathbf{x}_{t-1};\xi)\right)over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ( 1 - italic_Œ± ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ± ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + ( 1 - italic_Œ± ) ( ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) ), which matches the update of STORM. From this discussion, we see that NAG and STORM, two algorithms for accelerated gradient and variance reduction, respectively, can be unified by DiSK, an algorithm based on Kalman filtering.

With this discussion, we observe that the key difference between NAG and STORM is the choice of Œ≥ùõæ\gammaitalic_Œ≥. When Œ≥>0,ùõæ0\gamma>0,italic_Œ≥ > 0 , the algorithm is close to NAG, which focuses on ‚Äúexploring‚Äù and ‚Äúaccelerating‚Äù. When Œ≥<0ùõæ0\gamma<0italic_Œ≥ < 0, the algorithm is close to STORM, which focuses on ‚Äúexploiting‚Äù and ‚Äúreducing noise‚Äù.

Appendix B Proof for Section 4

In this section, we provide detailed proof for the results in Section 4.

We find the following relations useful:

‚ü®ùêö,ùêõ‚ü©ùêöùêõ\displaystyle\left\langle\mathbf{a},\mathbf{b}\right\rangle‚ü® bold_a , bold_b ‚ü© ‚â§12‚Å¢Œ±‚Å¢‚à•ùêö‚à•2+Œ±2‚Å¢‚à•ùêõ‚à•2,absent12ùõºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùêö2ùõº2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùêõ2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{2\alpha}\left\lVert\mathbf{a}\right\rVert^{2}+\frac{% \alpha}{2}\left\lVert\mathbf{b}\right\rVert^{2},‚â§ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_Œ± end_ARG ‚à• bold_a ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_Œ± end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_b ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , (19)
‚à•ùêö+ùêõ‚à•2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùêöùêõ2\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{b}\right\rVert^{2}‚à• bold_a + bold_b ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§(1+Œ±)‚Å¢‚à•ùêö‚à•2+(1+1/Œ±)‚Å¢‚à•ùêõ‚à•2.absent1ùõºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùêö211ùõºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùêõ2\displaystyle\leq(1+\alpha)\left\lVert\mathbf{a}\right\rVert^{2}+(1+1/\alpha)% \left\lVert\mathbf{b}\right\rVert^{2}.‚â§ ( 1 + italic_Œ± ) ‚à• bold_a ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( 1 + 1 / italic_Œ± ) ‚à• bold_b ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT . (20)

In the following sections, we use ùîºtsubscriptùîºùë°\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT to denote the expectation conditioned on all the information before iteration tùë°titalic_t. To prove Theorem 2, we first provide the following lemma to bound the difference between ùê†~tsubscript~ùê†ùë°\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and ‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Let us define Œît=‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚àíùê†~tsubscriptŒîùë°‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°subscript~ùê†ùë°\Delta_{t}=\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. We have: \xwedit

Lemma 1

Assume A1, A2 holds, we have:

ùîºt‚à•Œît‚à•2\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert\Delta_{t}\right\rVert^{2}blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢(1+4‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2+|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢(Œ∫+2‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢CŒ≥))‚Å¢‚à•Œît‚àí1‚à•2absentsuperscript1ùúÖ214superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø21ùõæùúÖ2superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2subscriptùê∂ùõæsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptŒîùë°12\displaystyle\leq(1-\kappa)^{2}\left(1+4\eta^{2}L^{2}+\left\lvert 1+\gamma% \right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)\right)\left\lVert% \Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}‚â§ ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ( italic_Œ∫ + 2 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
+2‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢(2+|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢CŒ≥)‚Å¢‚à•‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1)‚à•22superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2superscript1ùúÖ221ùõæsubscriptùê∂ùõæsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°12\displaystyle\quad+2\eta^{2}L^{2}(1-\kappa)^{2}\left(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma% \right\rvert C_{\gamma}\right)\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1})\right% \rVert^{2}+ 2 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

where we define CŒ≥=(1+4‚Å¢(2+1/Œ∫+|1+Œ≥|)Œ≥2).subscriptùê∂ùõæ1421ùúÖ1ùõæsuperscriptùõæ2C_{\gamma}=\left(1+\frac{4(2+1/\kappa+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)}{% \gamma^{2}}\right).italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ( 1 + divide start_ARG 4 ( 2 + 1 / italic_Œ∫ + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) .

B.1 Proof of Lemma 1

By the update of ùê†~tsubscript~ùê†ùë°\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we have:

ùîºt‚à•Œît‚à•2\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert\Delta_{t}\right\rVert^{2}blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=ùîºt‚à•‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚àí(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢ùê†~t‚àí1‚àíŒ∫B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t,Œæ)‚àíŒ∫‚Å¢ùê∞tabsentconditionalsubscriptùîºùë°‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°1ùúÖsubscript~ùê†ùë°1ùúÖùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâùúÖsubscriptùê∞ùë°\displaystyle=\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\|\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-(1-% \kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}-\frac{\kappa}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}% \nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t},\xi)-\kappa\mathbf{w}_{t}\right.= blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_Œæ ) - italic_Œ∫ bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
‚àí1‚àíŒ∫Œ≥‚Å¢B‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t(‚àáf(ùê±t+Œ≥ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)‚àí‚àáf(ùê±t;Œæ))‚à•2\displaystyle\qquad\qquad\left.-\frac{1-\kappa}{\gamma B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{% B}_{t}}\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\nabla f(% \mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)\right)\right\|^{2}- divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=(a)ùîºt‚à•(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢(‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚àí‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1))+(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢(‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1)‚àíùê†~t‚àí1)superscriptùëéabsentconditionalsubscriptùîºùë°1ùúÖ‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°11ùúÖ‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°1subscript~ùê†ùë°1\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{=}}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}% \left\|(1-\kappa)(\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1}))+(1-% \kappa)(\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1})-\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1})\right.start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG = end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_a ) end_ARG end_RELOP blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) ( ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) + ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) ( ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
+Œ∫‚Å¢(‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚àí1B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t,Œæ)‚àíùê∞t)ùúÖ‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°1ùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâsubscriptùê∞ùë°\displaystyle\qquad\qquad+\kappa\left(\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\frac{1}{B}\sum% _{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t},\xi)-\mathbf{w}_{t}\right)+ italic_Œ∫ ( ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_Œæ ) - bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
‚àí1‚àíŒ∫Œ≥‚Å¢B‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t(‚àáf(ùê±t+Œ≥ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)‚àí‚àáf(ùê±t;Œæ))‚à•2\displaystyle\qquad\qquad-\frac{1-\kappa}{\gamma B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}% }\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}% _{t};\xi)\right)\big{\|}^{2}- divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=(b)ùîºt‚à•(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢(‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚àí‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1)‚àí1B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t(‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ)‚àí‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1;Œæ)))‚èü:=D1superscriptùëèabsentconditionalsubscriptùîºùë°1ùúÖsubscript‚èü‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°11ùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°1ùúâassignabsentsubscriptùê∑1\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(b)}}{{=}}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}% \Bigg{\|}(1-\kappa)\underbrace{\left(\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\nabla F(\mathbf% {x}_{t-1})-\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t% };\xi)-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1};\xi)\right)\right)}_{:=D_{1}}start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG = end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_b ) end_ARG end_RELOP blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) under‚èü start_ARG ( ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) ) ) end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT := italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢Œît‚àí1+Œ∫‚Å¢(‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚àí1B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t,Œæ))‚èü:=D2‚àíŒ∫‚Å¢ùê∞t1ùúÖsubscriptŒîùë°1ùúÖsubscript‚èü‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°1ùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâassignabsentsubscriptùê∑2ùúÖsubscriptùê∞ùë°\displaystyle\qquad\qquad+(1-\kappa)\Delta_{t-1}+\kappa\underbrace{\left(% \nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\nabla f(% \mathbf{x}_{t},\xi)\right)}_{:=D_{2}}-\kappa\mathbf{w}_{t}+ ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∫ under‚èü start_ARG ( ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_Œæ ) ) end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT := italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ∫ bold_w start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
‚àí(1‚àíŒ∫)1B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t(1Œ≥‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t+Œ≥‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)+‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)‚àí1+Œ≥Œ≥‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ))‚èü:=D3‚à•2\displaystyle\qquad\qquad-(1-\kappa)\underbrace{\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in% \mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\frac{1}{\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}% _{t-1};\xi)+\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1}\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\frac{1+\gamma}{% \gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)\right)}_{:=D_{3}}\Bigg{\|}^{2}- ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) under‚èü start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) + ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - divide start_ARG 1 + italic_Œ≥ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) ) end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT := italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

=(d)(1‚àíŒ∫)2(2+|1+Œ≥|)ùîºt‚à•D1‚à•2+(1‚àíŒ∫)2(1+Œ∫|1+Œ≥|)‚à•Œît‚àí1‚à•2+Œ∫2(2+|1+Œ≥|)ùîºt[‚à•D2‚à•2]\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(d)}}{{=}}(1-\kappa)^{2}(2+\left\lvert 1+% \gamma\right\rvert)\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert D_{1}\right\rVert^% {2}+(1-\kappa)^{2}(1+\kappa\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)\left\lVert\Delta_% {t-1}\right\rVert^{2}+\kappa^{2}(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert)% \operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\left\lVert D_{2}\right\rVert^{2}]start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG = end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_d ) end_ARG end_RELOP ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ) blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + italic_Œ∫ | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ) ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Œ∫ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ) blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ]

where (a)ùëé(a)( italic_a ) we add and subtract (1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1)1ùúÖ‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°1(1-\kappa)\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1})( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) and rearrange the terms; (b)ùëè(b)( italic_b ) adds and subtracts 1‚àíŒ∫B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t(‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t;Œæ)‚àí‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1;Œæ))1ùúÖùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùúâ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°1ùúâ\frac{1-\kappa}{B}\sum_{\xi\in\mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};% \xi)-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1};\xi)\right)divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Œ∫ end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) ); (c)ùëê(c)( italic_c ) directly expands the square; and in (d)ùëë(d)( italic_d ), we notice that ùîºt‚Å°[D1]=0,ùîºt‚Å°[D2]=0formulae-sequencesubscriptùîºùë°subscriptùê∑10subscriptùîºùë°subscriptùê∑20\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[D_{1}]=0,\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[D_{2}]=0blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = 0 , blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = 0, so the first two inner products are zero, and we apply (19) to the other four inner products, with Œ±=Œ∫‚Å¢|1+Œ≥|,1,|1+Œ≥|ùõºùúÖ1ùõæ11ùõæ\alpha=\kappa\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert,1,\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvertitalic_Œ± = italic_Œ∫ | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | , 1 , | 1 + italic_Œ≥ |, respectively. Next, we bound each term separately. For ùîºt‚Å°[‚à•D3‚à•2]subscriptùîºùë°superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùê∑32\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\left\lVert D_{3}\right\rVert^{2}]blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ], we have:

ùîºt‚Å°[‚à•D3‚à•2]subscriptùîºùë°superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùê∑32\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\left\lVert D_{3}\right\rVert^{2}]blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ ‚à• italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] =ùîºt‚à•1B‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t(1Œ≥‚àáf(ùê±t+Œ≥ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)+‚àáf(ùê±t‚àí1ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)‚àí1+Œ≥Œ≥‚àáf(ùê±t;Œæ))‚à•2\displaystyle=\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in% \mathcal{B}_{t}}\left(\frac{1}{\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}% _{t-1};\xi)+\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1}\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\frac{1+\gamma}{% \gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t};\xi)\right)\right\rVert^{2}= blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) + ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - divide start_ARG 1 + italic_Œ≥ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚â§(a)1B‚Å¢‚àëŒæ‚àà‚Ñ¨t‚à•1Œ≥‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t+Œ≥‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)‚àí1Œ≥‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1;Œæ)superscriptùëéabsentconditional1ùêµsubscriptùúâsubscript‚Ñ¨ùë°1ùõæ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùõæsubscriptùêùùë°1ùúâ1ùõæ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°1ùúâ\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{\leq}}\frac{1}{B}\sum_{\xi\in% \mathcal{B}_{t}}\Bigg{\|}\frac{1}{\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf% {d}_{t-1};\xi)-\frac{1}{\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1};\xi)start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG ‚â§ end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_a ) end_ARG end_RELOP divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œæ ‚àà caligraphic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ )

‚â§(‚Å¢20‚Å¢)2‚Å¢‚à•1Œ≥‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t+Œ≥‚Å¢ùêùt‚àí1;Œæ)‚àí1Œ≥‚Å¢‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1;Œæ)‚à•2superscriptitalic-(20italic-)absent2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•1ùõæ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°ùõæsubscriptùêùùë°1ùúâ1ùõæ‚àáùëìsubscriptùê±ùë°1ùúâ2\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle\eqref{eq:split}}}{{\leq}}2\left\lVert% \frac{1}{\gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t}+\gamma\mathbf{d}_{t-1};\xi)-\frac{1}{% \gamma}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t-1};\xi)\right\rVert^{2}start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG ‚â§ end_ARG start_ARG italic_( italic_) end_ARG end_RELOP 2 ‚à• divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ bold_d start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ; italic_Œæ ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

Plug in (23) ‚Äì (B.1) to (B.1), we have:

This completes the proof of Lemma 1.

B.2 Proof of Theorem 2

Then, we are ready to prove Theorem 2. By choosing C‚â•G‚Å¢(1+2‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)Œ∫‚Å¢Œ≥),ùê∂ùê∫121ùúÖùúÖùõæC\geq G(1+\frac{2(1-\kappa)}{\kappa\gamma}),italic_C ‚â• italic_G ( 1 + divide start_ARG 2 ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ∫ italic_Œ≥ end_ARG ) , the clipping is inactive. Recall that from the update rule, we have

ùîºt‚Å°[ùê†~t]subscriptùîºùë°subscript~ùê†ùë°\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}]blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] =(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢ùê†~t‚àí1+Œ∫‚Å¢‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)+(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢(‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚àí‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1))absent1ùúÖsubscript~ùê†ùë°1ùúÖ‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°1ùúÖ‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°1\displaystyle=(1-\kappa)\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t-1}+\kappa\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t}% )+(1-\kappa)(\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t-1}))= ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∫ ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) ( ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) (27)
=‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚àí(1‚àíŒ∫)‚Å¢Œît‚àí1.absent‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°1ùúÖsubscriptŒîùë°1\displaystyle=\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})-(1-\kappa)\Delta_{t-1}.= ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Then, by A1, we have:

ùîºt‚Å°[F‚Å¢(ùê±t+1)]‚àílimit-fromsubscriptùîºùë°ùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°1\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[F(\mathbf{x}_{t+1})]-blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - F(ùê±t)‚â§‚àíŒ∑‚ü®‚àáF(ùê±t),ùîºt[ùê†~t]‚ü©+Œ∑2‚Å¢L2ùîºt‚à•ùê†~t‚à•2\displaystyle F(\mathbf{x}_{t})\leq-\eta\left\langle\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t}),% \operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}]\right\rangle+\frac{\eta^% {2}L}{2}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}\right% \rVert^{2}italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ - italic_Œ∑ ‚ü® ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ‚ü© + divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=(a)‚àíŒ∑‚à•‚àáF(ùê±t)‚à•2+Œ∑(1‚àíŒ∫)‚ü®‚àáF(ùê±t),Œît‚àí1‚ü©+Œ∑2‚Å¢L2ùîºt‚à•ùê†~t‚à•2\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{=}}-\eta\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf% {x}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}+\eta(1-\kappa)\left\langle\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t}),% \Delta_{t-1}\right\rangle+\frac{\eta^{2}L}{2}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}% \left\lVert\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{t}\right\rVert^{2}start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG = end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_a ) end_ARG end_RELOP - italic_Œ∑ ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) ‚ü® ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚ü© + divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚â§(b)‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢(1+Œ∫‚àí2‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢L)2‚à•‚àáF(ùê±t)‚à•2+Œ∑‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚à•Œît‚àí1‚à•2+Œ∑2Lùîºt‚à•Œît‚à•2,\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(b)}}{{\leq}}-\frac{\eta(1+\kappa-2\eta L)% }{2}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}+\frac{\eta(1-\kappa)}{% 2}\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}+\eta^{2}L\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{% t}\left\lVert\Delta_{t}\right\rVert^{2},start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG ‚â§ end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_b ) end_ARG end_RELOP - divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ ( 1 + italic_Œ∫ - 2 italic_Œ∑ italic_L ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , (28)

where (a)ùëé(a)( italic_a ) substitute (27); (b)ùëè(b)( italic_b ) applies (19) to the second term and we add and subtract ‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) to the last term and apply (20).

Define ‚Ñít:=F‚Å¢(ùê±t)+Œ≤‚Å¢‚à•Œît‚àí1‚à•2assignsubscript‚Ñíùë°ùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°ùõΩsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptŒîùë°12\mathcal{L}_{t}:=F(\mathbf{x}_{t})+\beta\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT := italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_Œ≤ ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, we have:

ùîºt‚Å°[‚Ñít+1]subscriptùîºùë°subscript‚Ñíùë°1\displaystyle\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}[\mathcal{L}_{t+1}]blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ‚àí‚Ñítsubscript‚Ñíùë°\displaystyle-\mathcal{L}_{t}- caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
‚â§‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢(1+Œ∫‚àí2‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢L)2‚à•‚àáF(ùê±t)‚à•2‚àí(Œ≤‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2)‚à•Œît‚àí1‚à•2+(Œ≤+Œ∑2L)ùîºt‚à•Œît‚à•2\displaystyle\leq-\frac{\eta(1+\kappa-2\eta L)}{2}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{% x}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}-(\beta-\frac{\eta(1-\kappa)}{2})\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1% }\right\rVert^{2}+(\beta+\eta^{2}L)\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}_{t}\left\lVert% \Delta_{t}\right\rVert^{2}‚â§ - divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ ( 1 + italic_Œ∫ - 2 italic_Œ∑ italic_L ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( italic_Œ≤ - divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ) ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( italic_Œ≤ + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚â§(a)‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢(1+Œ∫‚àí2‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢L)2‚Å¢‚à•‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚à•2‚àí(Œ≤‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2)‚Å¢‚à•Œît‚àí1‚à•2superscriptùëéabsentùúÇ1ùúÖ2ùúÇùêø2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°2ùõΩùúÇ1ùúÖ2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptŒîùë°12\displaystyle\stackrel{{\scriptstyle(a)}}{{\leq}}-\frac{\eta(1+\kappa-2\eta L)% }{2}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}-(\beta-\frac{\eta(1-% \kappa)}{2})\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1}\right\rVert^{2}start_RELOP SUPERSCRIPTOP start_ARG ‚â§ end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_a ) end_ARG end_RELOP - divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ ( 1 + italic_Œ∫ - 2 italic_Œ∑ italic_L ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( italic_Œ≤ - divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ) ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

+2‚Å¢(Œ≤+Œ∑2‚Å¢L)‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢\xwedit‚Å¢(2+|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢CŒ≥)‚Å¢‚à•‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1)‚à•22ùõΩsuperscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscript1ùúÖ2superscriptùêø2superscriptùúÇ2\xwedit21ùõæsubscriptùê∂ùõæsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°12\displaystyle\quad+2(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-\kappa)^{2}L^{2}\eta^{2}\xwedit{\left(% 2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert C_{\gamma}\right)}\left\lVert\nabla F(% \mathbf{x}_{t-1})\right\rVert^{2}+ 2 ( italic_Œ≤ + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢(1+Œ∫‚àí2‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢L)2‚Å¢‚à•‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t)‚à•2+2‚Å¢(Œ≤+Œ∑2‚Å¢L)‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢\xwedit‚Å¢(2+|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢CŒ≥)‚Å¢‚à•‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±t‚àí1)‚à•2absentùúÇ1ùúÖ2ùúÇùêø2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°22ùõΩsuperscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscript1ùúÖ2superscriptùêø2superscriptùúÇ2\xwedit21ùõæsubscriptùê∂ùõæsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±ùë°12\displaystyle=-\frac{\eta(1+\kappa-2\eta L)}{2}\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_% {t})\right\rVert^{2}+2(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-\kappa)^{2}L^{2}\eta^{2}\xwedit{% \left(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert C_{\gamma}\right)}\left\lVert\nabla F% (\mathbf{x}_{t-1})\right\rVert^{2}= - divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ ( 1 + italic_Œ∫ - 2 italic_Œ∑ italic_L ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 2 ( italic_Œ≤ + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚àí(Œ≤‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚àí(Œ≤+Œ∑2‚Å¢L)‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢(1+4‚Å¢L2‚Å¢Œ∑2+\xwedit‚Å¢|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢(Œ∫+2‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢CŒ≥)))‚Å¢‚à•Œît‚àí1‚à•2ùõΩùúÇ1ùúÖ2ùõΩsuperscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscript1ùúÖ214superscriptùêø2superscriptùúÇ2\xwedit1ùõæùúÖ2superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2subscriptùê∂ùõæsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptŒîùë°12\displaystyle\quad-\left(\beta-\frac{\eta(1-\kappa)}{2}-(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-% \kappa)^{2}(1+4L^{2}\eta^{2}+\xwedit{\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert\left(% \kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)})\right)\left\lVert\Delta_{t-1}\right% \rVert^{2}- ( italic_Œ≤ - divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG - ( italic_Œ≤ + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ( italic_Œ∫ + 2 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ) ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

where (a)ùëé(a)( italic_a ) applies Lemma 1 and (b)ùëè(b)( italic_b ) rearrange the terms. By choosing

Œ∑<12‚Å¢L‚Å¢(1+2‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢Œ≤‚Å¢L‚Å¢(2+|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢CŒ≥)),Œ∫>1‚àí11+4‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2+\xwedit‚Å¢|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢(Œ∫+2‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢CŒ≥),formulae-sequenceùúÇ12ùêø12superscript1ùúÖ2ùõΩùêø21ùõæsubscriptùê∂ùõæùúÖ1114superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2\xwedit1ùõæùúÖ2superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2subscriptùê∂ùõæ\eta<\frac{1}{2L(1+2(1-\kappa)^{2}\beta L(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert C% _{\gamma}))},\;\kappa>1-\frac{1}{\sqrt{1+4\eta^{2}L^{2}+\xwedit{\left\lvert 1+% \gamma\right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)}}},italic_Œ∑ < divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L ( 1 + 2 ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ≤ italic_L ( 2 + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) end_ARG , italic_Œ∫ > 1 - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG 1 + 4 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ( italic_Œ∫ + 2 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG end_ARG ,
Œ≤‚â•Œ∑‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)/2+Œ∑2‚Å¢L‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢(1+4‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2+\xwedit‚Å¢|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢(Œ∫+2‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢CŒ≥))1‚àí(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢(1+4‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2+\xwedit‚Å¢|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢(Œ∫+2‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢CŒ≥)),ùõΩùúÇ1ùúÖ2superscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscript1ùúÖ214superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2\xwedit1ùõæùúÖ2superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2subscriptùê∂ùõæ1superscript1ùúÖ214superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2\xwedit1ùõæùúÖ2superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2subscriptùê∂ùõæ\beta\geq\frac{\eta(1-\kappa)/2+\eta^{2}L(1-\kappa)^{2}(1+4\eta^{2}L^{2}+% \xwedit{\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}% \right)})}{1-(1-\kappa)^{2}(1+4\eta^{2}L^{2}+\xwedit{\left\lvert 1+\gamma% \right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)})},italic_Œ≤ ‚â• divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) / 2 + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ( italic_Œ∫ + 2 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) end_ARG start_ARG 1 - ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ( italic_Œ∫ + 2 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) end_ARG ,

we have:

Œ∑‚Å¢(1+Œ∫‚àí2‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢L)2‚àí2‚Å¢(Œ≤+Œ∑2‚Å¢L)‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢\xwedit‚Å¢(2+|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢CŒ≥)>0,ùúÇ1ùúÖ2ùúÇùêø22ùõΩsuperscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscript1ùúÖ2superscriptùêø2superscriptùúÇ2\xwedit21ùõæsubscriptùê∂ùõæ0\displaystyle\frac{\eta(1+\kappa-2\eta L)}{2}-2(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-\kappa)^{2}% L^{2}\eta^{2}\xwedit{\left(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert C_{\gamma}\right% )}>0,divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ ( 1 + italic_Œ∫ - 2 italic_Œ∑ italic_L ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG - 2 ( italic_Œ≤ + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 2 + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) > 0 , (30)
1‚àí(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢(1+4‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2+\xwedit‚Å¢|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢(Œ∫+2‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢CŒ≥))>0,1superscript1ùúÖ214superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2\xwedit1ùõæùúÖ2superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2subscriptùê∂ùõæ0\displaystyle 1-(1-\kappa)^{2}(1+4\eta^{2}L^{2}+\xwedit{\left\lvert 1+\gamma% \right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)})>0,1 - ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ( italic_Œ∫ + 2 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) > 0 ,
Œ≤‚àíŒ∑‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚àí(Œ≤+Œ∑2‚Å¢L)‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢(1+4‚Å¢L2‚Å¢Œ∑2+\xwedit‚Å¢|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢(Œ∫+2‚Å¢Œ∑2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢CŒ≥))‚â•0.ùõΩùúÇ1ùúÖ2ùõΩsuperscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscript1ùúÖ214superscriptùêø2superscriptùúÇ2\xwedit1ùõæùúÖ2superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2subscriptùê∂ùõæ0\displaystyle\beta-\frac{\eta(1-\kappa)}{2}-(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-\kappa)^{2}(1+% 4L^{2}\eta^{2}+\xwedit{\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert\left(\kappa+2\eta^{2}L% ^{2}C_{\gamma}\right)})\geq 0.italic_Œ≤ - divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG - ( italic_Œ≤ + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + 4 italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ( italic_Œ∫ + 2 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ‚â• 0 .

Average from t=0ùë°0t=0italic_t = 0 to T‚àí1ùëá1T-1italic_T - 1 and rearrange the terms, we have:

1T‚àët=0Tùîº‚à•‚àáF(ùê±t)‚à•2‚â§2‚Å¢(‚Ñí0‚àíùîº‚Å°[‚ÑíT+1])C1‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢T+2‚Å¢(Œ≤+Œ∑2‚Å¢L)‚Å¢Œ∫2C1‚Å¢Œ∑(\xwedit‚Å¢(2+|1+Œ≥|)‚Å¢œÉSGD2B+dœÉDP2)\displaystyle\frac{1}{T}\sum^{T}_{t=0}\operatorname{\mathbb{E}}\left\lVert% \nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{t})\right\rVert^{2}\leq\frac{2(\mathcal{L}_{0}-% \operatorname{\mathbb{E}}[\mathcal{L}_{T+1}])}{C_{1}\eta T}+\frac{2(\beta+\eta% ^{2}L)\kappa^{2}}{C_{1}\eta}\left(\frac{\xwedit{(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right% \rvert)}\sigma^{2}_{\mathrm{SGD}}}{B}+d\sigma^{2}_{\mathrm{DP}}\right)divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ divide start_ARG 2 ( caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - blackboard_E [ caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ italic_T end_ARG + divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_Œ≤ + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) italic_Œ∫ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ end_ARG ( divide start_ARG ( 2 + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ) italic_œÉ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_SGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG + italic_d italic_œÉ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_DP end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
‚â§2‚Å¢(F‚Å¢(ùê±0)+Œ≤‚Å¢‚à•‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±0)‚à•2‚àíF‚ãÜ)C1‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢T+2‚Å¢(Œ≤+Œ∑2‚Å¢L)‚Å¢Œ∫2C1‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢(\xwedit‚Å¢(2+|1+Œ≥|)‚Å¢œÉSGD2B+d‚Å¢œÉDP2),absent2ùêπsubscriptùê±0ùõΩsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±02superscriptùêπ‚ãÜsubscriptùê∂1ùúÇùëá2ùõΩsuperscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscriptùúÖ2subscriptùê∂1ùúÇ\xwedit21ùõæsubscriptsuperscriptùúé2SGDùêµùëësubscriptsuperscriptùúé2DP\displaystyle\quad\leq\frac{2(F(\mathbf{x}_{0})+\beta\left\lVert\nabla F(% \mathbf{x}_{0})\right\rVert^{2}-F^{\star})}{C_{1}\eta T}+\frac{2(\beta+\eta^{2% }L)\kappa^{2}}{C_{1}\eta}\left(\frac{\xwedit{(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right% \rvert)}\sigma^{2}_{\mathrm{SGD}}}{B}+d\sigma^{2}_{\mathrm{DP}}\right),‚â§ divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_Œ≤ ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_F start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ italic_T end_ARG + divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_Œ≤ + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) italic_Œ∫ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ end_ARG ( divide start_ARG ( 2 + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | ) italic_œÉ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_SGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_B end_ARG + italic_d italic_œÉ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_DP end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , (31)

where we define C1:=(1+Œ∫‚àí2‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢L)‚àí4‚Å¢(Œ≤+Œ∑2‚Å¢L)‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ∫)2‚Å¢L2‚Å¢Œ∑‚Å¢\xwedit‚Å¢(2+|1+Œ≥|‚Å¢CŒ≥),assignsubscriptùê∂11ùúÖ2ùúÇùêø4ùõΩsuperscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscript1ùúÖ2superscriptùêø2ùúÇ\xwedit21ùõæsubscriptùê∂ùõæC_{1}:=(1+\kappa-2\eta L)-4(\beta+\eta^{2}L)(1-\kappa)^{2}L^{2}\eta\xwedit{% \left(2+\left\lvert 1+\gamma\right\rvert C_{\gamma}\right)},italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT := ( 1 + italic_Œ∫ - 2 italic_Œ∑ italic_L ) - 4 ( italic_Œ≤ + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L ) ( 1 - italic_Œ∫ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ ( 2 + | 1 + italic_Œ≥ | italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) , and in the last inequality we notice that ‚ÑíT+1=F‚Å¢(ùê±T+1)+Œ≤‚Å¢‚à•ŒîT‚à•2‚â•F‚ãÜ,subscript‚Ñíùëá1ùêπsubscriptùê±ùëá1ùõΩsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptŒîùëá2superscriptùêπ‚ãÜ\mathcal{L}_{T+1}=F(\mathbf{x}_{T+1})+\beta\left\lVert\Delta_{T}\right\rVert^{% 2}\geq F^{\star},caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_Œ≤ ‚à• roman_Œî start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• italic_F start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , and ‚Ñí0=F‚Å¢(ùê±0)+Œ≤‚Å¢‚à•‚àáF‚Å¢(ùê±0)‚à•2,subscript‚Ñí0ùêπsubscriptùê±0ùõΩsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùêπsubscriptùê±02\mathcal{L}_{0}=F(\mathbf{x}_{0})+\beta\left\lVert\nabla F(\mathbf{x}_{0})% \right\rVert^{2},caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_Œ≤ ‚à• ‚àá italic_F ( bold_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , as we initialize ùê†~0=0.subscript~ùê†00\tilde{\mathbf{g}}_{0}=0.over~ start_ARG bold_g end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = 0 . This completes the proof of Theorem 2.

\xwedit

On the choice of Œ≥=‚àí1ùõæ1\gamma=-1italic_Œ≥ = - 1. From the above proof, we see that in Appendix B.1, (B.1) (c)ùëê(c)( italic_c ), we directly apply (19) to upper bound the cross-product terms by positive terms for the worst case, which results in the optimal choice of Œ≥=‚àí1ùõæ1\gamma=-1italic_Œ≥ = - 1. However, the inner products may be smaller than zero in some cases, making Œ≥=‚àí1ùõæ1\gamma=-1italic_Œ≥ = - 1 sub-optimal in practice.

Appendix C Additional numerical results

C.1 Experiment details

Coding: The code for the experiments will be provided online. We use PyTorch as the code base and the FastDP package (Bu et al., 2023) to privatize the optimizers. The Algorithm 3 is implemented as a PyTorch optimizer, which can be easily combined with any training scripts based on PyTorch. The modification is minimum:

‚¨á
1from KFOptimizer import KFOptimizer
2# define base optimizer
3optimizer = KFOptimizer(model.parameters(), base_optimizer, kappa, gamma)
4# ...
5# in training loop:
6 def closure(): # warp up the loss and backward computation
7 loss = model(input)
8 loss.backward()
9 return loss
10 loss = optimizer.prestep(closure)
11 # ...

The link to the full code of the experiments can be found at https://anonymous.4open.science/r/KalmanDP-BEDB.

Hardware: All the experiments except the ImageNet-1k dataset are running with one Nvidia A40 (48GB memory) or one Nvidia V100 (32GB memory). The experiment on the ImageNet-1k dataset is running on one Nvidia H100 (80GB memory) GPU. The training time varies for different tasks depending on the data size and model size.

Training method: We use gradient accumulation to deal with the large batch size and use learning rate warm-up for 1/201201/201 / 20 of the training steps when training from randomly initialized weights. We also use the Cosine Annealing learning rate scheduler (Loshchilov & Hutter, 2022), which gradually decreases the learning rate.

C.2 Choice of hyper-parameters

The main hyper-parameters in the algorithms are: epoch Eùê∏Eitalic_E, batch size BùêµBitalic_B, step size Œ∑ùúÇ\etaitalic_Œ∑, clipping threshold Cùê∂Citalic_C, Kalman filter parameters Œ∫ùúÖ\kappaitalic_Œ∫, and Œ≥ùõæ\gammaitalic_Œ≥. In all experiments, we fix the clipping method as automatic clipping used in Bu et al. (2024), i.e., clip‚Å¢(‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±;Œæ),C)=‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±;Œæ)‚ãÖC‚à•‚àáf‚Å¢(ùê±;Œæ)‚à•,clip‚àáùëìùê±ùúâùê∂‚ãÖ‚àáùëìùê±ùúâùê∂delimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìùê±ùúâ\mathrm{clip}\left(\nabla f(\mathbf{x};\xi),C\right)=\nabla f(\mathbf{x};\xi)% \cdot\frac{C}{\left\lVert\nabla f(\mathbf{x};\xi)\right\rVert},roman_clip ( ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x ; italic_Œæ ) , italic_C ) = ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x ; italic_Œæ ) ‚ãÖ divide start_ARG italic_C end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• ‚àá italic_f ( bold_x ; italic_Œæ ) ‚à• end_ARG , and set C=1ùê∂1C=1italic_C = 1 for all experiments.

For each set of experiments, we conduct a grid search on the hyper-parameters E,B,Œ∑ùê∏ùêµùúÇE,B,\etaitalic_E , italic_B , italic_Œ∑ and choose the optimal ones for the DP optimizer without DiSK. The search grids of each hyper-parameter are listed in Table 2;

Then, we fix E,B.Œ∑formulae-sequenceùê∏ùêµùúÇE,B.\etaitalic_E , italic_B . italic_Œ∑ and conduct the ablation study on Œ∫,Œ≥ùúÖùõæ\kappa,\gammaitalic_Œ∫ , italic_Œ≥ as shown in Figure 8.

C.3 Additional experiments on CV tasks

Training different models from scratch: We additionally train the WRN-16-4 and the ViT-small models on the CIFAR-10 with randomly initialized weights for different privacy budgets, and the test accuracies during the training are shown in Figure 4 for œµ=4italic-œµ4\epsilon=4italic_œµ = 4. From the results, we can see that DiSK consistently outperforms the base optimizer.

Fine-tuning on CIFAR-100: Besides training from scratch, we also compare the performance of fine-tuning a pre-trained ViT-small model on the CIFAR-100 dataset. The results for different œµitalic-œµ\epsilonitalic_œµ are shown in Figure 5. For fine-tuning on the complex CIFAR-100 dataset, DiSK still improves the performance compared with DPAdam, and has less performance drop under large DP noise.

Comparison with existing methods and SOTA: We conduct comparisons with existing approaches for improving DP training performance. In Figure 6(a), we train a linear regression model with synthetic data and compared the performance of Noisy GD, Noisy GD with DOPPLER (NoisyLP), and with DiSK (NoisyKF). We inject Gaussian noise with different variances into the gradient and compare the final performance. We observe that DiSK has the lowest regression loss under all noise levels, indicating that the Kalman filter performs better in noise reduction than the Low-pass filter. In Figure 6(b), we compare the test accuracy of different methods, including DOPPLER (Zhang et al., 2024a) and DP-FTRL (Kairouz et al., 2021; Choquette-Choo et al., 2024) on the CIFAR-10 dataset training the WRN from scratch. We observe that DiSK  significantly outperforms the SOTA algorithms on all privacy budgets.

Comparison with SOTA on ImageNet: Additionally, we conduct experiments to compare the performance of DiSK with SOTA result training from scratch on the ImageNet-1k dataset in De et al. (2022). The result is shown in Figure 7. We note that the reported test accuracy in the De et al. (2022) is 32.4%percent32.432.4\%32.4 % for privacy level œµ=8italic-œµ8\epsilon=8italic_œµ = 8. However, we noticed that their accounting procedure has been improved in their GitHub repository and hence we re-ran their experiment using the new accountant to obtain our baseline. We kept all their options on, including group normalization, larger batch size, weight standardization, augmentation multiplicity, and model exponential moving average. In addition, we also follow their normalized clipping strategy, i.e.,

clip‚Å¢(‚àáf,C)=‚àáfC‚Å¢min‚Å°{C‚à•‚àáf‚à•,1}.clip‚àáùëìùê∂‚àáùëìùê∂ùê∂delimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëì1\mathrm{clip}\left(\nabla f,C\right)=\frac{\nabla f}{C}\min\left\{\frac{C}{% \left\lVert\nabla f\right\rVert},1\right\}.roman_clip ( ‚àá italic_f , italic_C ) = divide start_ARG ‚àá italic_f end_ARG start_ARG italic_C end_ARG roman_min { divide start_ARG italic_C end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• ‚àá italic_f ‚à• end_ARG , 1 } .

Their updated code results in 36.35%percent36.3536.35\%36.35 % validation accuracy and the test accuracy of 33.56%percent33.5633.56\%33.56 % (as the SOTA result). In comparison, adding DiSK on top of their method results in a validation accuracy of 40%percent4040\%40 % (3.7%percent3.73.7\%3.7 % improvement) and a test accuracy of 36.89%percent36.8936.89\%36.89 % (3.3%percent3.33.3\%3.3 % improvement). This sets a new SOTA result for differentially private training on the ImageNet-1k dataset.

Ablation study: We conduct ablation studies on the choice of the hyper-parameters of DiSK, specifically, how Œ∫,Œ≥ùúÖùõæ\kappa,\gammaitalic_Œ∫ , italic_Œ≥ impact the algorithm performance. In Figure 8, we plot the accuracy on different combinations of (Œ∫,Œ≥)ùúÖùõæ(\kappa,\gamma)( italic_Œ∫ , italic_Œ≥ ), and (Œ∫,œµ)ùúÖitalic-œµ(\kappa,\epsilon)( italic_Œ∫ , italic_œµ ). We observe a clear trend of performance change for different combinations of the parameters, and there is an optimal choice of Œ∫,Œ≥ùúÖùõæ\kappa,\gammaitalic_Œ∫ , italic_Œ≥ for different œµitalic-œµ\epsilonitalic_œµ‚Äôs.

C.4 Additional experiments on NLP tasks

In this section, we provide additional results for NLP tasks.

Parameter-efficient fine-tuning on GLUE. We fine-tune a RoBERTa-base and a RoBERTa-large model from the Huggingface checkpoints222https://huggingface.co/FacebookAI/roberta-base,https://huggingface.co/FacebookAI/roberta-large on the GLUE dataset. We follow the same training scripts in Bu et al. (2024) on the hyper-parameter choices of Œ∑,B,EùúÇùêµùê∏\eta,B,Eitalic_Œ∑ , italic_B , italic_E on the tasks and use rank r=16ùëü16r=16italic_r = 16 for LoRA. We choose Œ∫=0.7,Œ≥=0.5formulae-sequenceùúÖ0.7ùõæ0.5\kappa=0.7,\gamma=0.5italic_Œ∫ = 0.7 , italic_Œ≥ = 0.5 for DiSK. The results are listed in Table 3. With privacy budget œµ=1,6.7italic-œµ16.7\epsilon=1,6.7italic_œµ = 1 , 6.7, DPLoRA with DiSK significantly outperforms SOTA results with vanilla DPLoRA on all tasks.

Fine-tuning GPT-2 on text generation tasks. We fine-tune a GPT-2-small model with 137‚Å¢M137ùëÄ137M137 italic_M parameters from the Huggingface checkpoints333https://huggingface.co/openai-community/gpt2 on two text generation datasets, E2E and DART. We follow the same training scripts in Li et al. (2021) on the hyper-parameter choices of Œ∑,B,EùúÇùêµùê∏\eta,B,Eitalic_Œ∑ , italic_B , italic_E on the tasks and choose Œ∫=0.7,Œ≥=0.5formulae-sequenceùúÖ0.7ùõæ0.5\kappa=0.7,\gamma=0.5italic_Œ∫ = 0.7 , italic_Œ≥ = 0.5 for DiSK. The results on different metrics for the E2E dataset are given in Table 4, and the results for the DART dataset are in Table 5. With privacy budget œµ=3,8italic-œµ38\epsilon=3,8italic_œµ = 3 , 8, DPAdamW with DiSK significantly outperforms SOTA results with vanilla DPAdamW on all metrics.

C.5 Improvement over SOTA

In the following Table LABEL:tab:app:sota, we provide a list of the experiment settings where our algorithm outperforms SOTA results. The paper that provides the SOTA results is cited for each setting, or the same as the line above. We observe that DiSK provides new SOTA for CV datasets, including CIFAR-10, CIFAR-100, and ImageNet-1k, and NLP datasets, including GLUE (MNLI, QNLI, QQP, SST-2), DART, and E2E.

Instructions for reporting errors

We are continuing to improve HTML versions of papers, and your feedback helps enhance accessibility and mobile support. To report errors in the HTML that will help us improve conversion and rendering, choose any of the methods listed below:

  • Click the "Report Issue" button.
  • Open a report feedback form via keyboard, use "Ctrl + ?".
  • Make a text selection and click the "Report Issue for Selection" button near your cursor.
  • You can use Alt+Y to toggle on and Alt+Shift+Y to toggle off accessible reporting links at each section.

Our team has already identified the following issues. We appreciate your time reviewing and reporting rendering errors we may not have found yet. Your efforts will help us improve the HTML versions for all readers, because disability should not be a barrier to accessing research. Thank you for your continued support in championing open access for all.

Have a free development cycle? Help support accessibility at arXiv! Our collaborators at LaTeXML maintain a list of packages that need conversion, and welcome developer contributions.
